title: The Rajkumari Diamond Haaram with Ruby Accents and Pearl Drops
materials: intricately set with brilliant-cut diamonds (VS Clarity
G-H Color). Features central ruby gemstones (high quality
heat treated for color enhancement). Delicate freshwater pearls dangle from the pendant for added elegance. Finished with traditional Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a layered design, reminiscent of traditional Telugu bridal jewelry. The intricate diamond work features floral and paisley motifs, creating a breathtaking display of craftsmanship. The central ruby stones add a regal touch, while the pearl drops provide a soft, feminine contrast. The Haaram is designed with adjustable length to ensure a perfect fit, perfect for all special occassions
colors: Primarily gold and white (diamonds) with pops of vibrant red from the rubies and the creamy white of the pearls.
occasions: and special occasions like seemantham (సీమంతం) or half-saree functions. A truly regal piece for the modern woman who appreciates timeless elegance.
description: This Diamond Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's a statement piece steeped in South Indian tradition. The combination of high-quality diamonds, radiant rubies, and lustrous pearls creates a mesmerizing effect. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees lasting brilliance. Own a piece of heritage and elevate your look with this stunning heirloom-worthy necklace.
